name: Jungleman
description:
VERSION 3.4: This game is very simple. Control the pony by using the arrow keys, and kill enemies by shooting bullets (left click), which do 1 damage, or blocks of cheese (right click), which do 3 damage.. You have 10 health, monsters have 5, smart monsters have 5 too, sharks have 10, the boss has 70, the ball has 25, and the squash has 15. If any enemies remain after the end of each level, they carry over in to the next level. The game is broken up into five levels, Blue Square, Boss, Red Square, Ball, and Squash. Have fun!

Note: There is a way out of Z!
